item.title: Kenya election SMS services (cross-post)
item.description:
Kenya election SMS services (cross-post)

Cross-posting an informative piece from election time (4 March 2013), written by Anahi Ayala Iacucci (of Internews, CrisisMappers, etc) …Kenya: one election, 7 phone services, 3 maps and some confusion!We all knew it. We saw this coming in Haiti and talked about it in Egypt, when 5 Ushahidi maps popped out the day before the elections.

item.title: Summary of Election Analyses
item.description:
Summary of Election Analyses

A few pieces of election analysis, within the year after the election
